sentence.Network_en: Underneath this image of normalcy, addiction threatened to rip this family apart.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这一切正常的表象下潜伏的是将使这个家庭四分五裂的毒瘾。

sentence.Network_en: He said that the government was committed to restore normalcy and hold elections in the Punjab.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说政府会致力于恢复正常秩序，并在旁遮普省进行选举。

sentence.Network_en: It is important that we not stop the proceedings to report normalcy.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们不要打断进程来报告常态信息,这一点很重要.

entry.def: Normalcy is a situation in which everything is normal.

example.ex: He said that the government was committed to restore normalcy and hold elections in the Punjab...
example.tran: 他说政府会致力于恢复正常秩序，并在旁遮普省进行选举。

example.ex: Underneath this image of normalcy, addiction threatened to rip this family apart.
example.tran: 在这一切正常的表象下潜伏的是将使这个家庭四分五裂的毒瘾。

means.word_mean: 1. being within certain limits that define the range of normal functioning
2. expectedness as a consequence of being usual or regular or common
